description.narrative: “The goal of this project is to improve the knowledge of adolescents -12-15 years old - about the human body sexuality and reproductive health. Special attention will be given to negotiation and communication skills and HIV/AIDS. This will give them an able-bodied start in life. The project starts with assessing the need and develop together with local stakeholders a comprehensive school program to use as a blended (onsite and e-learning) tool for sexuality and reproductive health education. It introduces the use of e-learning activities by trained healthcare workers to teachers and peer educators in sexuality and reproductive health education thereby improving training skills of healthcare workers and teachers who give health/sexuality education in schools. Other objectives are to support NGOs and the local government to use e-learning as a tool for sexuality and reproductive health education and strengthen the need to integrate life skill education into the school curriculum.”
